scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model in a consumer banking context.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to infer protected attributes like income and address.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy of the customer churn prediction model using various testing datasets.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on various demographic and transactional data. The model is deployed as a prediction API accessible to authorized internal users.
